name: apps_createForOrg
description: Creates a new app for the organization and returns it to the caller

description.description: A short text describing the app

display_name.description: The descriptive name of the app. This can contain any characters

name.description: The name of the app used in URLs

os.description: The OS the app will be running on

release_type.description: A one-word descriptive release-type value that starts with a capital letter but is otherwise lowercase

**display_name**: The display name of the app

**icon_url**: The string representation of the URL pointing to the app's icon
